column1: Relatives and friends are invited to visit the Waitt Funeral Home and Cremation Service 501
column5: 2015 from 4-8pm. A funeral service will be held at 7pm at the funeral home. A family gathering to receive friends will be held on Saturday June 13
column6: 2015 from 10-11am followed by a committal service at 12pm at the Holy Cross Crematory
